abstract.t: This document specifies a TLS extension that enables clients to send generic user mapping hints in a supplemental data handshake message defined in RFC TBD. One such mapping hint is defined in an informative section, the UpnDomainHint, which may be used by a server to locate a user in a directory database. Other mapping hints may be defined in other documents in the future. (NOTE TO RFC EDITOR: Replace "RFC TBD" with the RFC number assigned to draft-santesson-tls-supp-00.txt).
